alerts.title: Severe Thunderstorm Warning
alerts.description: A severe thunderstorm is expected in the London area. Take precautions immediately. Lightning and heavy rainfall expected.
alerts.advice: Stay indoors, avoid open spaces, and unplug electronic devices.

alerts.title: Flood Warning
alerts.description: Heavy rain is expected to cause flooding in low-lying areas. Be prepared for road closures and possible evacuations.
alerts.advice: Avoid driving through flooded roads, stay updated with local alerts, and move to higher ground if necessary.

preparationSteps: Stay tuned to local news and alerts.
Unplug electronic devices to prevent damage.
